creator: konrad@hansin.com.pl
text:
For establishing jdbc realm in server.xml file one need to type URL for 
connection with database. For MySQL due to Tomcat documentation it is:

connectionURL="jdbc:mysql://localhost/authority?user=dbuser;password=dbpass"
                                                          ^^^

But this one is wrong. Problem is with mark after user argument value, in place 
of "&" there is ";". First I changed it back to "&" but XML validation failed. 
So I typed "&" what is of course "&" substitute in XML, and now everything 
works OK.

So the solution is to write statement with URL in this form:

connectionURL="jdbc:mysql://localhost/authority?user=dbuser&password=dbpass"
                                                           ^^^^^

I hope it will help somebody.
